import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login',{username,password});localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.token);// Redirect to products page or dashboard
